results.title: In Biden’s Foreign Policy, Friends and Foes Claim Echoes of Trump
results.abstract: President Biden’s speech at the U.N. was a stark contrast to President Donald J. Trump’s. But it came amid complaints that some of Mr. Biden’s policy moves echoed his predecessor’s approach.

results.title: Gira Sarabhai, Designer Who Helped Shape Modern India, Dies at 97
results.abstract: The youngest daughter of an influential family of industrialists, she trained with Frank Lloyd Wright before returning to India and founding design institutions.

multimedia.caption: Gira Sarabhai, second from right, in an undated photo with the designer Deborah Sussman and the artist Haku Shah. Ms. Sarabhai was instrumental in shaping postcolonial Indian design.

results.title: New Taliban Guidelines Stir Fear About the Future of Press Freedom
results.abstract: The directives for journalists include rules against publishing topics in conflict with Islam or insulting to national personalities.
